name: Delivered
description: An online chat with real-time messages receiving serviced by Ratchet websocket. Whole application based is on Symfony framework, using Twig and JavaScript to handle front-end.

name: BlogApp
description: An online blog application, based on Laravel framework, using Blade and JavaScript to handle front-end.

name: Restaurant
description: A restaurant page that allows online ordering based on Symfony, using Twig and JavaScript to handle front-end.

name: Gallery
description: Online portal storing photos, avalaible to download for everyone, based on Symfony framework, using Twig and JavaScript to handle front-end.
